channel.title: PsychicPodcasts.com
channel.description:
Psychic and Spiritual Podcasts, including self development and interviews with host Sahar Huneidi, a regular columnist for Prediction magazine. Recent Podcasts include interviews with Stewart Pearce and two of my appearances on LBC Radio. Also see www.PS-Magazine.com for more articles and email,and our new www.Podcasts4Life.com.

Enjoy.

item.title: Angel Lady Jacky Newcomb
item.description: Interview with author about her new books and her experiences.
item.author: PS-Magazine.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with UK's angle lady and author Jacky Newcomb
item.itunes:summary: Jacquie Turner, the Angel Adviser for PS-Magazine.com interviews author.

item.title: Remote Viewing and psychic skills
item.description: Sahar's second interview with Brian SnellGrove who is a remote viewer.

item.title: Nemesis, Complete song based on poem by Khaled Bazzi
item.description: Khaled Bazzi, inspirational columnist for PS-Magazine.com announces: "I am very excited to share with you the release of my first single 'Nemesis'. About 15 years ago, I wrote a poem entitled 'In Neptune's Kingdom Green and Vast', which I shared with PS Magazine readers some time ago. This poem has always been very special to me as the whole poem came to me in one go, in a flash of inspiration. I had no idea at the time that it would one day become a song."

item.title: Merlian News, USA, talks to Author and psychic Sahar Huneidi, UK, about her new book on Coffee Cup Readings
item.description:
A professional spiritual intuitive, writer and teacher; who lives in New York. She comes from a long lineage of practising Celtic psychics. Her web site is a regularly updated resource of Holistic information concerning the development of the intuitive faculties. She interviews Sahar Huneidi is a professional intuitive, a Spiritual Life Coaching columnist for Prediction Magazine (the original body mind spirit magazine in the UK, established in 1936), and publisher of PS-Magazine.com- a holistic Internet resource.

Sahar talks about her book Your Fortune in A Coffee Cup - The Art of Divining with Coffee Grounds,
item.itunes:subtitle: In this Podcast Sahar discusses with Merryn Jose, her book, her busy life as a psychic, and her plans for the future.
item.itunes:summary: A professional spiritual intuitive, writer and teacher; who lives in New York. She comes from a long lineage of practising Celtic psychics. Her web site is a regularly updated resource of Holistic information concerning the development of the intuitive faculties. She interviews Sahar Huneidi is a professional intuitive, a Spiritual Life Coaching columnist for Prediction Magazine (the original body mind spirit magazine in the UK, established in 1936), and publisher of PS-Magazine.com- a holistic Internet resource. Sahar talks about her book Your Fortune in A Coffee Cup - The Art of Divining with Coffee Grounds,
item.itunes:keywords: psychic, coffee, book, cup readings, sufi, sufism

item.title: Nemesis, preview of song based on by Khaled Bazzi.
item.description: Khaled is a spiritual and inspirational columnist. This is his latest song, based on a poem he wrote.
item.author: KhaledBazzi@aol.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Khaled Bazzi, Inspirational writer, released his first song based on a poem he wrote
item.itunes:author: khaled bazzi

item.title: Sahar interviews Wilma Davidson about the task of spirit release
item.description: Sahar interview Wilma Davidson about her work in releasing Earth-bound spirits. This is a fascinating subject and Wilma explains how psychics can assist those who remain trapped on this plane, by guiding them to the Light.
item.author: sahar Huneidi

item.title: Sahar interviews Brian Snellgrove about his work as a remote viewer.
item.description: Sahar interviews Brian Snellgrove about his work as a remote viewer. Brian has been advising businesses for many years and is retained to analyse candidates for senior positions. His website is www.remoteview.co.uk
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Sahar interviews Jewelle St. James about her book "Jude, My Reincarnation from Auschwitz".
item.description: Sahar interviews Jewelle St. James about her book "Jude, My Reincarnation from Auschwitz". In this book Jewelle writes about her past life as a Jewish woman in Auschwitz.
item.author: Sahar Huneidi

item.title: Sahar interviews Jewelle St. James about her book "All You Need is Love".
item.description: Sahar interviews Jewelle St. James about her book "All You Need is Love" about a past life in 17th century Sussex with John Lennon.
item.author: Sahar Huneidi

item.title: Sahar interviews Penny Kelly about her recent book, "Consciousness and Energy".
item.description:
In this fifth interview with Penny Kelly Sahar asks her about her book "Consciousness and Energy", in which she describes how consciousness operates.>
Penny's Website is www.lilyhillfarm.org
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Dawn Paul talks about Soul Retrieval
item.description:
Dawn Paul is a Shaman of the Inca Lineage.
She has spent time with the Q'ero of Peru and has learned their amazing healing methods. She allows the lineage of the Inca to work through her.

In this interview with Sahar Dawn talks about the process of Soul Retrieval and how it can literally make you whole again. Her Website is www.liberate-online.co.uk
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Sahar interviews Penny Kelly about her book "Robes"
item.description:
In this third interview with Penny Kelly Sahar asks her about her book "Robes", in which Penny received information about the development of human society in the 21st Century

Penny's Website is www.lilyhillfarm.org
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Sahar's October 2006 newsletter
item.description: In her October newsletter Sahar compares cooking and inspiration
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Interview with Jacky Newcomb
item.description:
Known as "the Angel Lady", Jacky has written a series of books on Angels, including "An Angel Saved My Life" and her forthcoming book "An Angel By My Side".

Jacky's Website is www.angellady.co.uk
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Interview with Stephanie Brookes
item.description:
Sahar interviews author of "Some Silent Hero", a spiritual novel about the growth of spiritual awareness.

Stephanie's Website is www.spiritualphilosophy.co.uk
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Sahar's September 2006 newsletter
item.description: In her September newsletter Sahar describes her work on her forthcoming book and highlights some recent articles and Podcasts
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Sahar interviews Penny Kelly about her book "The Elves of Lily Hill Farm"
item.description:
In this interview Penny Kelly talks about her communication with the elves who work on her family's farm and how she learnt the importance of this connection with small natural intelligences.

Penny's Website is www.lilyhillfarm.org
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Sahar interviews Penny Kelly about her book "The Evolving Human"
item.description:
In this interview Penny Kelly talks about her experience of Kundalini with Sahar Huneidi. Penny explains that Kundalini involves a spontaneous awakening of consciousness.
Penny's Website is www.lilyhillfarm.org
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Sahar interviews Jude Currivan about her book 'The 8th Chakra'
item.description: In this interview Sahar Huneidi interviews Jude Currivan about her book 'The 8th Chakra'.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Sahar interviews Jude Currivan about her book 'The Wave'
item.description: In this interview Sahar Huneidi interviews Jude Currivan about her book 'The Wave'. In 'The Wave' Jude Currivan explores the interconnectedness of the universe.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Interview with Canadian psychic and writer Natasha Rosewood
item.description: Natasha Rosewood talks with Sahar about psychic development and her books.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Interview with Khalid Bazzi, talking about the "Human Given Course" for self-development
item.description: Interview with Khalid Bazzi, IT executive, discussing the "Human Given Course": A holistic course for self-development, while pursuing his full time job too. Imagination, dream analysis, mythology, mental wellbeing, and other aspects of the human psyche are discussed. This is an Certificate Training Program leading to becoming a certified practitioner in Counseling.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Video Project - Alex Stewart and Clare Munday
item.description: Video Project - Alex Stewart and Clare Munday of Greenwich University discuss their video project on dreams with Sahar. Clare also discusses her project on family reunion.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Interview with Dawn Paul
item.description:
Dawn Paul is a Shaman of the Inca Lineage.
She has spent time with the Q'ero of Peru and has learned their amazing healing methods. She allows the lineage of the Inca to work through her.

Her Website is www.liberate-online.co.uk
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Interview with Marie-France
item.description: Dr. Marie-France Hankinson, an international counselor, a doctor of Metaphysics, and PhD. in Complimentary, Alternative and Preventative Therapies, including Transpersonal Psychology and Relationship Dynamics. She taught for three years at Delphi University and now working across the Atlantic.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: LBC Interview with Nick Ferrari 17 March 2006
item.description: An interview on LBC Radio (London) 17 March with Nick Ferrari, in which he asks Sahar how she works and what a psychic does
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: 3rd Interview with Stewart Pearce "Sound Over Matter"
item.description:
This is the third of a series of interviews with Stewart Pearce the author of "The Alchemy of Voice" and Master of Voice at the Shakespeare Globe Theatre in London. His clients have included many important politicians and actors, including Margaret Thatcher.
In this Podcast Stewart explains how the use of sound can have direct effects on your body, and how it also creates harmony in your relationships.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Fifth interview with Dr Atwater
item.description: Dr P M H Atwater is well-known for her books on near death experiences. Recently she has also written about the changes which she foresees for this planet and the development of the human race. In this Podcast we discuss her latest book, "Beyond the Indigo Children: The New Children and the Coming of the Fifth World."
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Second interview with Karen Clickner
item.description: Karen Clickner is a naturopath who practises in Boston, USA. Her Website is www.isisboston.com
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: The Age of Information
item.description: The age of information."Last week, while sipping my decaf double shot cappuccino at Amoul Deli, an article in the Financial Times on Podcasting captured my attention. It seems that university students in the United States are going less to lecture halls, preferring to download lectures' video podcasts directly to their iPods!"

item.title: First interview with Karen Clickner
item.description: Karen Clickner is a naturopath who practises in Boston, USA. Her Website is www.isisboston.com
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Jessica Murray talks with Sahar about macro-transits and astrology
item.description:
Jessica Murray is a professional astrologer who lives and practices in San Francisco, California. She is a frequent contributor to The Mountain Astrologer and PS Magazine and is currently writing a book on Plato.
This is her second interview with Sahar
Her Website is www.mothersky.com
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Dr Atwater talks on near death experiences in children
item.description: Dr P M H Atwater is well-known for her books on near death experiences. Recently she has also written about the changes which she foresees for this planet and the development of the human race. In this Podcast we discuss her latest book, "Beyond the Indigo Children: The New Children and the Coming of the Fifth World."
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Interview with Dr P M H Atwater - near death experiences in adults
item.description: In this interview with Dr P M H Atwater - we discuss the effects of near death experiences [NDE] in adults, these effects include changes in the brain and increased IQ. Dr Atwater has experienced NDE herself and is one of the leading authorities on the subject.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Jessica Murray a professional astrologer talks to Sahar (1st interview)
item.description:
Jessica Murray is a professional astrologer who lives and practices in San Francisco, California. She is a frequent contributor to The Mountain Astrologer and PS Magazine and is currently writing a book on Plato.
Her Website is www.mothersky.com
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Interview with Tania Ahsan, Editor of Prediction Magazine
item.description: This interview, recorded on the 1st December 2005, with Tania Ahsan discusses the joys and problems of editing the oldest psychic and spirit magazine in the UK.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: 2nd Interview with Dr P M H Atwater - Future Memory
item.description: Dr P M H Atwater is well-known for her books on near death experiences. This Podcast is a discussion of her classic "Future Memory" dealing with near death experiences.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Dr P M H Atwater, discussion - "Beyond the Indigo Children"
item.description: Dr P M H Atwater is well-known for her books on near death experiences. Recently she has also written about the changes which she foresees for this planet and the development of the human race. In this Podcast we discuss her latest book, "Beyond the Indigo Children: The New Children and the Coming of the Fifth World."
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Interview with Stewart Pearce about the use of voice
item.description: This is the second of a series of interviews with Stewart Pearce the author of "The Alchemy of Voice" and Master of Voice at the Shakespeare Globe Theatre in London. His clients have included many important politicians and actors, including Margaret Thatcher.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Asandra - Interview with a professional channeller
item.description:
This interview is with Asandra who considers herself to be a multidimensional being. This is expressed through her work as an artist, writer, and trance-channel.
She has written a number of articles for PS-Magazine.com and her Website is Asandra.com
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: November Newsletter
item.description: Psychic Sahar's November 2005 newsletter
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Interview with Kris Deva North - on Taoism
item.description:
Taoist Teacher and Tantric Scholar, Kris harmonises Shamanic, Tantric and Taoist traditions of the short path.
In 1993 he founded the London Tao Centre and the Zen School of Shiatsu.

He has been interviewed several times on national TV about Taoist Tantric practice, most recently in Emma Freuds series on Sex and Religion and Nick Hancocks Sex and Stopping - History of Contraception.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Interview with Stewart Pearce
item.description:
This interview is with Stewart Pearce Stewart was born in London, England, having trained as an Actor Teacher worked in Repertory Theatre. In 1980 his practice as a Voice Coach began, teaching under the auspices of Cicely Berry at the 'Guildhall School of Music & Drama', and in 1981 Stewart became the Head of Voice at the prestigious 'Webber Douglas Academy of Dramatic Art', until 1998. Since 1998 Stewart has been the Resident Master of Voice at 'Shakespeare's Globe Theatre' and in 2001 became the Head of Voice at the 'Drama Centre London'

His Website is www.thealchemyofvoice.com
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Quantum Reality
item.description: Creating your own reality by making choices - opening up new opportunities
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Psychic Coffee Cup Readings
item.description: This is a conversation that I had with a visitor to the Website. In it we discuss the meaning of the symbols that cup-coffee readers use and the way in which you should approach a coffee-cup reading.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: September Newsletter
item.description: Sahar's Podcast version of her regular monthly newsletter
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: A holistic balanced life
item.description:
This Podcast is about how your life's path is not predestined, but how you need to understand that there is an ideal template for your life. To have a harmonious balanced life we need to focus on a holistic view of our experiences and existence.
Your life reflects your soul's calling towards integrating various aspects of your life.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: Interview with Mantak Chia 2005
item.description: Sahar's exclusive interview with the famous Taoist Master Mantak Chia. This took place during a recent visit to London. Mantak Chia is founder of the Healing Tao.
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: LBC Interview April 2005
item.description: My first interview on LBC Radio (London) in April 2005
item.author: sahar huneidi

item.title: How to Use a Psychic Reading
item.description: A short piece on how to use a psychic reading

item.description: Interview with Iain Lee on LBC Radio (London) August 2005
